title: The Importance of Sensory-Friendly Schools in Child Development
excerpt: How a sensory-friendly environment can significantly impact learning and behavior for children with autism.
author: Admin
content:
For children with autism, sensory processing can be a challenge. A sensory-friendly school environment is designed to minimize overwhelm and maximize learning potential.

Features like calming colors, noise reduction, and designated sensory breaks can help children regulate their emotions and stay focused.
